title: Trade in goods: country-by-commodity, exports and imports 2021
publisher: International trade in services by subnational areas of the UK: 2018
description: Monthly import country-by-commodity data on the UK's trade in goods, including trade by all countries and selected commodities, non-seasonally adjusted.
datasetNotes: Data can be found on the landing page in a zip folder under current
notes: The data set is located in a Zip folder
